questions.prompt: A fictional criminal mastermind (and unfortunate ethnic stereotype), who appeared in stories by British author Sax Rohmer, has a name which lives on today in the area of grooming. What is that name?
Name any one of the three 1990s sitcom kids who were the children of Danny Tanner and Pam Katsopolis Tanner.

What American artist's 1952 painting Mountains and Sea, pictured here, was her first professionally exhibited work and is today likely her best-known, though she would continue to produce pieces into the 21st century?
Name any one of the British monarchs (with regnal number) who are members of the dynasty originally known as the House of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha.
questions.answer: edward vii, george v, edward viii, george vi, elizabeth ii
